name: frosh/mail-validation
description: Validates email addresses by checking their actual existence on the target mail server. Reduces bounces, fake addresses, and sustainably improves deliverability.

description.de-DE: Validiert E-Mail-Adressen durch Prüfung der tatsächlichen Existenz beim Zielserver. Reduziert Bounces, Fake-Adressen und verbessert nachhaltig die Zustellbarkeit.
description.en-GB: Validates email addresses by checking their actual existence on the target mail server. Reduces bounces, fake addresses, and sustainably improves deliverability.

check: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/ext shopware/shopware-cli:latest extension validate --check-against lowest --full /ext
